creator: hays_robert@hotmail.com
text:
When trying to upgrade from 1.2.14 to 1.2.15, maven is unable to get the required jms artifacts required for this new version.

This issue can already be seen logged here:

http://issues.appfuse.org/browse/APF-867

There already exists a work-around, but I would think that the developers of log4j would want to help push the fix of this issue since Maven is such a key development tool.  Making maven work seamleassly with log4j versions is imperitive for the development community to easily and quickly transition to new versions of the product.

If this is considered a "Maven" issue and it is not desired to push the fix from this end, that is unfortunate but understandable.

Thank you for your time.

Sincerely,
Concerned developer
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of bug 46589 ***
creator: gscokart@gmail.com
